name: CBSIG
title: Case Based Surveillance Implementation Guide
description: An IG that is used to support case based surveillance messaging for the public health domain

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Epi Questionnaire Panel
resource.description: Defines constraints on Observation to represent structured resources for the collection and organization of epidemiological questions.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Case Notification Panel Member
resource.description: Defines constraints on the CBS Case Notification Panel Profile for defining the member resources of the case notification panel in public health surveillance programs.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Cause of Death Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on on the Observation resource for supporting public health reporting workflows involving the cause of death of the subject.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Co-Condition Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on on the Condition resource for any additional conditions beyond the condition of interest for surveillance. The requirements for these conditions are less strict structurally, and warrant a simpler profile.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Composition Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints to the Composition resource in order to meet the needs of public health surveillance programs.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Condition of Interest Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions to the Condition resource in order to meet the needs of public health surveillance programs while providing as much alignment with US Core requirements as possible.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Exposure Observation Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints to the CBS Case Notification Panel Member profile to represent the exposure observations of the case notification panel.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Hospitalization Encounter Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on Encounter to represent hospitalization due to a condition of interest in public health surveillance programs.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Lab Test Report
Case Based Surveillance Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR) Elements
resource.description: Defines constraints on CBS Case Notification Panel to represent the MMWR elements of the case notification panel in public health surveillance programs.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Patient Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions to the patient resource in order to meet the needs of public health surveillance programs while providing as much alignment with US Core requirements as possible. Mapping between similar concepts implemented with different value sets (ie: race, ethnicity, or sex assigned at birth) may be required.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Performing Laboratory Profile
resource.description: NOT FINAL GOING TO CHANGE

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Person Reporting To CDC Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on on the Practitioner resource for supporting public health reporting workflows involving the person reporting to the CDC.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Reporting Source Organization Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints to the Organization resource in order to meet the needs of public health surveillance programs regarding the reporting source.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Specimen Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the Specimen resource in order to meet the needs of public health surveillance programs.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Case Notification Panel Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on Observation to represent the case notification panel in public health surveillance programs.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Sex Assigned at Birth Extension
resource.description: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Case Class Status
resource.description: A code denoting the status of the case/event as suspect, probable, confirmed, or not a case per CSTE/CDC/surveillance case definitions.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Diagnosis Date Extension
resource.description: A dateTime indicating when the condition of interest was diagnosed.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Ethnicity Extension
resource.description: Concepts classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality.  The ethnicity codes used to represent these concepts are based upon the [CDC ethnicity and Ethnicity Code Set Version 1.0](http://www.cdc.gov/phin/resources/vocabulary/index.html) which includes over 900 concepts for representing race and ethnicity of which 43 reference ethnicity.  The ethnicity concepts are grouped by and pre-mapped to the 2 OMB ethnicity categories: - Hispanic or Latino - Not Hispanic or Latino. This extension is based on the equivalent US Core extension though utilizes the public health focused PHIN Value Set and limiting data based on established standards in public health case based surveillance messaging.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Race Extension
resource.description: Concepts classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Specimen Role Extension
resource.description: Indicates the role of the sample.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Illness Duration
resource.description: Illness duration to obscure PHII in place of absokute dates.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Related Case Extension
resource.description: A list of strings with relevant case numbers and a type element that specifies the nature of the relation.

resource.name: Additional codes for Address.use.
resource.description: Codes for Address.use which are used as slice discriminators to capture address history at relevant points in time to case surveillance.

resource.name: CBS Case Notification Panel Value Set
resource.description: Codes found in the case notification panel that are otherwise not captured in other CBS profiles.

resource.name: Combined ValueSet for Lab DiagnosticReport Code.
resource.description: Codes for Lab Test Type. The codes are from two PHINVADS valuesets to support labs test repeating group

resource.name: Combined ValueSet for Lab Observation Result.
resource.description: Codes for Lab Observations Result Value. The codes are from two PHINVADS valuesets to support lab results in MMG and Lab Repeating Group

resource.name: Combined ValueSet for Lab Observation Code.
resource.description: Codes for Lab related Observations. The codes are to support labs in MMG and Lab Repeating Group

resource.name: CBS Related Case Type Value Set
resource.description: Codes found in the case notification panel that are otherwise not captured in other CBS profiles.

resource.name: STD Sexual History and Drug Use Questionnaire Panel
resource.description: This is an example valueset for how to setup coding for an Epi Questionnaire Panel using a selection of codes from the STD MMG.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance temporary/placeholder code system.
resource.description: Code system defined as placeholders for items that are not defined in existing systems.

resource.name: Co-Condition-Example
resource.description: An example resource that is conformant to the Case Based Surveillance Co-Condition profile.
